name: Deploy Container
on: push: branches: [main] tags: ['v*.*.*'] paths: - 'src/**' - 'package.json' - 'Dockerfile' - '.github/workflows/deploy.yml' workflow_dispatch:
permissions: contents: read packages: write
jobs: test: name: Pre-build Quality Gates runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Setup Node uses: actions/setup-node@v4 with: node-version: 22.x cache: 'npm'
- name: Install dependencies run: npm install --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps
- name: Format check run: npm run format:check
- name: Lint run: npm run lint
- name: Unit tests + Coverage thresholds run: npm run test:coverage
# Manual Trivy installation & filesystem scan - name: Install Trivy run: | sudo apt-get install wget apt-transport-https gnupg -y wget -qO - https://aquasecurity.github.io/trivy-repo/deb/public.key | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/trivy.gpg > /dev/null echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/trivy.gpg] https://aquasecurity.github.io/trivy-repo/deb generic main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/trivy.list sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install trivy -y
- name: Security scan (FS HIGH/CRITICAL) run: trivy fs --exit-code 1 --severity HIGH,CRITICAL --no-progress . || { echo 'High/Critical vulnerabilities found in filesystem'; exit 1; }
- name: Health endpoint smoke (node process) run: | node src/index.js & SERVER_PID=$! echo "Server PID: $SERVER_PID" for i in {1..10}; do sleep 1 curl -sf http://localhost:3000/health && break || echo "Waiting for health... ($i)" done curl -sf http://localhost:3000/health | grep '"status":"ok"' kill $SERVER_PID
build-and-push: name: Build & Push Image needs: test runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Read version from package.json id: pkg run: echo "version=$(jq -r .version package.json)" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
- name: Set up QEMU (multi-arch) uses: docker/setup-qemu-action@v2
- name: Set up Buildx uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2
- name: Log in to GHCR uses: docker/login-action@v3 with: registry: ghcr.io username: ${{ github.repository_owner }} password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
- name: Extract metadata (tags, labels) id: meta uses: docker/metadata-action@v5 with: images: ghcr.io/${{ github.repository }} tags: | type=ref,event=branch type=sha type=raw,value=latest,enable=${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' }} type=semver,pattern={{version}},value=${{ steps.pkg.outputs.version }}
- name: Build and push (multi-arch) uses: docker/build-push-action@v6 with: context: . file: ./Dockerfile platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64 push: true tags: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }} labels: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.labels }} provenance: false
- name: Scan image with Trivy (HIGH/CRITICAL) uses: aquasecurity/trivy-action@v0.13.0 with: image-ref: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }} severity: 'HIGH,CRITICAL' format: 'table' ignore-unfixed: true exit-code: '1' vuln-type: 'OS,library'
- name: Run container health check run: | IMAGE=$(echo "${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}" | head -n1 | cut -d',' -f1) echo "Testing image: $IMAGE" docker run -d --name scarmserver-test -p 3000:3000 $IMAGE || exit 1 for i in {1..15}; do sleep 2 curl -sf http://localhost:3000/health && break || echo "Waiting for container health... ($i)" done curl -sf http://localhost:3000/health | grep '"status":"ok"' docker rm -f scarmserver-test
- name: Summary run: | echo "### Deployment Summary" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY echo "Version: ${{ steps.pkg.outputs.version }}" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY echo "Tags: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY echo "Image built, scanned, and health check passed." >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
